name: Langanga
description:
Langanga is a narrative platformer made in a week for the PIGSquad Summer Slow Jams.

Controls
    Gamepad
  • Movement - D-Pad
  • Jump - A Button
  • Back to Menu - Change View/Back Button
    Keyboard
  • Movement - Arrow Keys
  • Jump - Space Bar
  • Start Game - Enter
  • Back to Menu - Escape
The Team
  • Ryan Kubik - Programming
  • Sandra Lanz - Art
  • Lia Snyderman - Art and Animation
  • Wes Mueller - Narrative, Music, Sound, Programming
